alert.note: Alert for Modoc County; North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County; Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 17 at 2:32PM PDT until April 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In California, North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County, Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties and Modoc County. This includes portions of highway 97 in the Mt Hebron area, and the Warners including portions of highway 299. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com or http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Modoc County; North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County; Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties
